name: Present
description: You send a booby-trapped gift to a creature. Make a ranged attack on a creature in range. On a hit, the present explodes, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage. If the natural attack roll is 2 or lower, however, regardless if it hits, the present provides the target with 1d6 + MOVE hit points instead.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.

contest.effect: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
